name: Jieming Shi 0001
content: Jieming Shi Dr. Jieming SHI Assistant Professor Department of Computing The Hong Kong Polytechnic University I am looking for highly self-motivated PhD students, PostDocs, and research assistants. If you are interested, please send me your CV. Thanks! (All CVs are carefully evaluated. Only matched candidates will be responded.) Research Interests Data Management and Mining, with a focus on - Large-scale graph processing, e.g., algorithms on complex types of graphs, and - Efficient multi-dimensional data management, e.g., spatial, tabular, vector data. Email: Short Bio I am an assistant professor in the Department of Computing at The Hong Kong Polytechnic University (PolyU). I earned my PhD in Computer Science from The University of Hong Kong (HKU) and completed a postdoctoral fellowship at the School of Computing at the National University of Singapore (NUS). I received my bachelorâ€™s degree from Nanjing University.
